templates.title: COM_EASYSTORE_EMAIL_TEMPLATE_PAYMENT_ERROR_TITLE
templates.subtitle: COM_EASYSTORE_EMAIL_TEMPLATE_PAYMENT_ERROR_SUBTITLE
templates.subject: Payment Error for Order #{order_id}
templates.body:
Dear {customer_name},

We regret to inform you that there was an issue with the payment for your recent order with us. Unfortunately, we were unable to process your payment successfully. The details of your order are as follows:

Order ID: {order_id}
Order Date: {order_date}

If you believe this is an error, we recommend the following steps:

  1. Double-check your payment information for accuracy, including the card number, expiration date, and CVV code.
  2. Ensure that the billing address provided matches the one associated with your payment method.
  3. If you are using a credit or debit card, confirm that your card is valid and has available credit.
  4. If you continue to experience issues, we recommend trying an alternative payment method, such as a different card or payment option.

If you still encounter difficulties or have questions about this payment error, please do not hesitate to reach out to our customer support team at {store_email} or call us at {store_phone}. We are here to assist you in resolving this issue and completing your order.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and appreciate your patience and understanding.

Thank you for considering {store_name}. We value your business and hope to provide you with a seamless shopping experience.

Sincerely,

{store_name}
{store_address}
{store_email}
{store_phone}

templates.title: COM_EASYSTORE_EMAIL_TEMPLATE_NEW_ACCOUNT_TITLE
templates.subtitle: COM_EASYSTORE_EMAIL_TEMPLATE_NEW_ACCOUNT_SUBTITLE
templates.subject: Welcome to {store_name} - Your New Account
templates.body:
Dear {customer_name},

We are excited to welcome you to {store_name}! Thank you for creating your account with us. Your journey with us has just begun, and we can't wait to provide you with a seamless and enjoyable experience.

Here are a few things you can do with your {store_name} account:

  1. Explore Our Products: Browse our wide range of high-quality products and discover the perfect items for your needs.

  2. Save Your Favorites: Save your favorite products to your wishlist for easy access later.

  3. Streamlined Checkout: Enjoy a faster and more convenient checkout process when you make a purchase.

  4. Order Tracking: Keep an eye on the progress of your orders and access tracking information easily.

  5. Exclusive Offers: As a valued member, you'll receive exclusive promotions, discounts, and updates.

To get started, simply log in to your account Password Reset Link and start exploring the exciting features we have to offer.

Thank you for choosing {store_name}. We value your trust and look forward to serving you. Welcome aboard!

{store_name}
{store_phone}
{store_address}
